TestGroupDocumentation.Title: Partial default Marshaller implementation tests. (content tree test)
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: Compile a simple schema to create a java binding classes. Test the class jakarta.xml.bind.helpers.AbstractMarshallerImpl using this context.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: getEventHandler() returns default event handler if one hasn't been set.

TestCaseDocumentation.Author: Evgueni Rouban

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: getProperty(name) throws PropertyException if there is no such property
